com.davidbracewell.hermes

Class DocumentFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidbracewell.hermes.DocumentFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class DocumentFactory
extends Object
implements Serializable

    A document factory facilitates the creation of document objects. It handles performing any predefined preprocessing and helps in determining the type of document being read. A default factory can be obtained by calling getInstance() or a factory can be built using a DocumentFactory.Builder constructed using builder().

    The default factory uses configuration settings to determine the default language and preprocessing normalizers. The default language is defined using the hermes.DefaultLanguage configuration property and the normalizers are defined using the hermes.preprocessing.normalizers configuration property.

    Author:
    David B. Bracewell
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
